content: After the fight, speak to the Pale-Axe Stalwart again and exhaust his dialogue. Then go along the tree trunk near him to collect the green Wisps that sit on it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'The Emerald Hall' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Crimson Silver Cart'.
The content is as follows:
After the fight, speak to the Pale-Axe Stalwart again and exhaust his dialogue. Then go along the tree trunk near him to collect the green Wisps that sit on it.
